summary: I guess I should put sexy, hot, cute, beautiful, and/or concupiscent Breton female in the description to get more views and downloads - but I\'m totally above doing that.
descriptionHtml:
This is Zilch, my young Breton woman just as she set out into the world after her near-death experience.

The save game is right after she emerged from the cave under the torture chamber. I don\'t know why she followed Hadvar (the Imperial guy) after the dragon attacked but I guess she got frazzled and found his authority comforting (even if he was about to allow her to be beheaded moments before).

She\'s carrying all the loot she could grab, read all the books she could read, and picked all the locks she could pick. She snuck past the bear in lieu of killing it for no good reason. She hasn\'t leveled yet of course so therefore no perks have been spent.

She\'s a bit shorter than your average Breton female and a bit quicker as well but if I hadn\'t divulged that here you probably wouldn\'t even have noticed.

Play nice now.
author: Rekicker
